website_summaries.verdict: A good screen for home use, but it's not a commercial-grade product.
pros: Has a nice elevation to make the picture easy to view – even from a distance
Doesn't move much in the wind
cons: Tends to be difficult to get the wrinkles out of the screen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It's huge! Used it in the backyard for a graduation party with a projector, blu-ray player and computer speakers. Easy to set up and take down, fans not too loud at all. Picture is without the screen attached for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Bootleg956

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I ever made. I bought this a couple years ago and I've hosted a poolside movie night every year for 100 plus people in my backyard and everyone loves this screen and looks forward to the next year. See my video review
customer_reviews.author: KNESBEY

customer_reviews.title: perfect for an outdoor cinema!!!
customer_reviews.text: The screen is exactly as it appears on the pictures. I got it for an special surprise (celebrating my 3rd anniversary) and I created an outdoors cinema, adding the inflatable screen add that SPECIAL TOUCH I was looking for! my boyfriend was so excited and absolutely loved the surprise. The screen is very easy to use, just plug it to an outlet and voilá! I didn't even need to secure it to the floor or anything. The only difficult part is to put it back on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sánchez Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: First time trying to inflate. Wont inflate, motors are not strong enough. Checked both and they are unencumbered. Will inflate without screen but not with. Motors are severely under powered. Unfortunately waited to long to return. What a piece of sugar honey ice tea. If you dont mind not hearing your show or have an electric hook up your leaf blower and it will stand up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Best decision ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write product reviews so quickly but I received this today and OMG I am so happy with my purchase!! I bought a projector for my kiddos 2 years ago and bought the screen and set it up and it was so much more difficult then this! It is super huge!! And my kids love it. We watched a movie then played Mario cart on it tonight and it was so fun!! I am 5'4 it takes less then ten minutes to setup for me. The photos do not give this thing justice at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Can't return projector horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service. Wanted to send back because screen was wrinkled and not clear at all even with N expensive projector. This was their response for my return: product image Gemmy 39127-32 Deluxe Airblown Movie Screen Inflatable with Storage Bag, 144" Screen 12 FT TALL x 11.5 WIDE ASIN: B00DH5FS3Y Item is clearly an inflatable object, we do not consider a wrinkle to be an issue on an inflatable object. There's even wrinkles in the picture. DO NOT ORDER YOU CANT RETURN IT
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This screen came with broken components. The box was in great condition and well packed but the shrouds around the fan were in pieces! Air leaks out around them but it does inflate. Disappointing for sure for the cost of a 14’ blowup screen
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished having an outdoor movie night and it worked so well! Had a few problems at the beginning keeping it to stay up but it was my fault because I had not checked the zipper lining the fans at the bottom. Check the zippers!!! Great size and looking forward to more movie nights in the future! I paid for this item and it was worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Damaso Navarro Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: To be honest with the price I was skeptical to say the least, but I bought it. I have used it four or five times so far with no issues even had some windy times here in Florida no issues, there are, were, folds but once up no issue at all once movie is on, fans do make noise but not to bad with good sound system overall great value for the money would buy again if needed it is a WOW factor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE!!!! It has worked great for our outdoor movie nights. The fans are a little noisy so just make sure you have room to be away from the screen and have your sound away from it too. It's super easy to set up, just make sure you have the zippers all the way closed or it won't inflate fully....we learned the hard way!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsie Watt

customer_reviews.title: Screen has missing clip!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like another reviewer stated, the screen is missing a clip. The missing clip is on the bottom and when the screen is up it appears to be tight enough to still use. I’m just disappointed because I can’t say if problems will arise down the line and this item is not easily returned. It was easy to inflate, deflate and bag up. All in a matter of minutes. I will be keeping it and hope for the best. 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hawker

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use movie screen
customer_reviews.text: This was ridiculously easy to use. Just plug it in and it inflates in about 60 seconds. Clip the screen into the hooks (about another 60 seconds) and flip it right side up and you are ready to go. It's very light, so on a windy evening, you will want to stake it down. Fantastic find for creating a safe, social distancing movie night. Don't forget the popcorn and movie candy!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Beckmann

customer_reviews.title: IT CAME TORN-REPAIRED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for the money...the screen is a very good quality, the inflatable is "ok", the fans are some-what fragile, the duffle carry-bag is "ok". overall, it's great for the money. i was loving it, until i noticed a torn on the base which looks repaired!!!....that means i was sold a used product or a repaired product at best for the price of a new one. It feels like a scam to me.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Break down and storage is also very easy.
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a metal frame projection screen, that was a pain to set-up. I used it for my shows on stage and for movie nights in the backyard with the family. I finally sold it and purchased this. This is a dream. You stake it, plug it in and in a few seconds you have a GIANT projection screen. It does have a few wrinkles and you can't rear-project, but compared to what I used to have to set-up.... I'll take this one any day of the week! Break down and storage is also very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for outdoor movie nights
customer_reviews.text: Having a blast with this unit. Bought the projector and the portable stand all together for less than $300! Have done 2 movie nights at home, 2 camping movie nights for the campground and 1 team building event. I’ll use this many more times for sleep overs and high school team bonding events. Takes me about 10 min to unpack and set up. About 20 min to deflate and repack into the duffle it came in. It’s a little faster with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This screen is very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Received this today, and after first use my expectations were exceeded. This screen is very easy to set up, you lay the black frame out flat, buckle the screen to the frame and plug it in. It inflates in just a couple of minutes and you're ready to go. Once inflated it's basically a 12' sail, so if you're outside you may want to use the included tethers to keep it form blowing over. The fans are very quiet, about as loud as a small oscillating fan. It all folds (stuffs) into a bag slightly larger than you're allowed to put in an overhead compartment on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good but with a few mior setbacks
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice so far and it's very easy to setup. Fans are powerful enough to get it completely inflated in about 2-3min. Screen on the other-hand has a lot of wrinkles. Theres 6 buckles on 1 long end and 4 on the opposite side. The frame only has 4 buckles per side, not really sure where the other 2 are suppose to go and doesnt fit quite right but with a bit of manipulation to the straps it seems OK.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Fans are super quiet and do not interfere with the sound of ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a team building event for my daughter's gymnastics team. We had an outdoor movie and since have used numerous times to host neighborhood movie night and at an outdoor wedding I planned for a client. A little cumbersome to setup and breakdown alone. Definitely must have another person to help set up though. Fans are super quiet and do not interfere with the sound of the movie or slideshows. Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lady

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son had borrowed one from his friend and I just had to have it! We have used it for my granddaughter's birthday party and our family reunion. I is fun to have a big screen outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Game Night!
customer_reviews.text: I though this was a great value. We purchased it for a backyard BBQ and game night. Having the game on inside as well as in the yard made it so easy to accommodate a large group of people. The night got a little chilly, but we had plenty of lawn chairs and extra blankets to keep everyone happy. Its pretty easy to anchor but it will significantly sway when wind picks up, but the movement did not create any issue with the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: bphoto review

customer_reviews.title: like this inflatable screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen was easy to setup and it performed wonderfully for a grandson's birthday party. To give you some perspective of the size, It completely spans the width of a two car driveway and extends higher that the roof of a normal two car garage. But even at that size, it is stable and moves very little with a breeze. The fans are always on, but they're not loud enough to affect the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stewart

customer_reviews.title: SO FREAKIN COOL
customer_reviews.text: I can't say nothing but good things about this product.. I bought this for my sons birthday party, and it has gone above and beyond. There are wrinkles in the screen, but as soon as we bought it we rolled the screen up and stored it laying across the our shelves. Once it was dark you could not see the wrinkles at all. The set up is crazy easy, and the kids loved watching the movie under the stars. The added bonus is the bag for storage. we just rolled it up and placed it back into its bag which is the size of a standard duffel bag. BONUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bree REAL

customer_reviews.title: FANTABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantabulous! I really didn’t know what to expect, but this inflatable screen far outweighed my expectations! We purchased it to watch my son’s virtual graduation ceremony with our family in the yard. Easy up and great viewing. Like other reviews, I do recommend a plastic bin/tub for storage. The bag is just not big enough. The blower is quiet and our screen was great. You will need some speakers with your projector of course. A great buy! TY!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice Screen
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to some friends' sons who have birthday's two weeks apart. They've used it several times in the last couple of weeks and said that it's easy to use and sturdy. It's larger than expected - so the neighbors on both sides have been able to watch from their decks too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cortina

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoor Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor screen! Yes it's a little wrinkled but you can't tell once it's completely dark out. We've shown movies and hosted football watching parties. You do have to anchor it down when it's windy and put lawn solar lights or glow sticks near the anchors so people don't trip over them in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: DandMLane

customer_reviews.title: A great screen, good quality, and attractive price!
customer_reviews.text: I just can't say enough good things about this screen. It is easy to set up, looks great, and stores away easily. About 10 minutes to set up and maybe 15 to put away. The screen wrinkles, for me, are a non-issue. It's a temporary set up for a fun weekend event, not a videophile permanently mounted screen, so take it for what it is, a fun event screen. That being said, the screen is of good quality and provides a great picture with good apparent gain. Great for backyard movie nights, family reunions in the park, company picnics, etc.
customer_reviews.author: L.Brize

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor movie screen
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is massive! This was very easy to get inflated, maybe taking 10 or 15 minutes total time. For sure, don't try to do this the first time in the dark because there's a lot of pieces to clip together. Unless you are an expert origami master, forget about ever getting the entire unit back into the duffle bag. I was able to get the inflatable part including the fans into the bag but the white screen which detaches and all the rope and stakes I left out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly huge and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: You'll need a lot of space for this hugely impressive screen. Very sturdy and thick. Inflates in about 3-5 minutes which is stupid fast given the size of this monstrous beauty! Instant popularity for you and your family! Btw, I can't imagine how this would ever fit in the box or even the carry bag they send it with...its massive. So we bought a red plastic tub from Smart n Final and will store it in there. Way easier
customer_reviews.author: VOK

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Initially this was amazing! The first two movies we watched were great. It inflated quickly and easily. Very dissatisfied overall. After only two uses it no longer fully inflates. Once the screen is attached, the top part flops forward or backward even when you try to use the stakes to tie it down. It is not fully inflating. Very very disappointed and would NOT recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great but..
customer_reviews.text: Would have been awesome if it actually inflated all the way. No matter what we tried the center slumped in. Maybe I have a dud
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great portable outdoor screen
customer_reviews.text: I used this to project movies at Halloween and it was awesome. It sets-up super fast and packs up pretty quick too. It inflates quickly and runs quiet. It's so cool, that i want to figure out more occasions to use it. It should last for years at the rate i use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: EPIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: We pretty much rule the whole damn neighborhood now that we are hosting our Backyard Movie Nights with this monster of a screen. EVERYONE LOVES IT!!! It is enormous! And very impressive! Yaayyyyy! The ONLY issue is that it arrived with grease-like splotches across the screen but we are working on exchanging it for another. So far, about 4 emails between us and the company and things seem to be progressing smoothly EXCEPT that I still haven't received a return shipping label (it's been about 3 days...). Unfortunately, we have to return the entire product, not just the screen part, which means Backyard Movie Night is on hold this weekend. Booo!
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Great investment without the big price!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfectly sized for my backyard and family movies! What a great price and investment!
customer_reviews.author: Pearls

customer_reviews.title: I ❤️ this screen!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this screen to show backyard “dive in” movies. It is INCREDIBLE! The two fans that inflate the screen are very quiet and it inflates/ deflates quickly. It is easy to set up and take down - I can do this unassisted in about 20 minutes. The best part is that it actually fits back in the bag it came in! I did supplement the equipment with 8 ziplocks to store the tie down ropes separately because I tangled them when I put them away the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Defective blower frames
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing really bad to say about this product it’s a great movie screen, easy to set up, the family loves it, and so do the neighbors when we did a neighborhood movie night in our Cul-de-sac. But the issues is with the blower frames. While blowing up the screen for the first time we heard a couple pops as we looked for where it came from we saw that both blower frames cracked and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Dud product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a graduation party. Opened and set up for the event only one motor working. Returned and reordered a replacement still have not received
customer_reviews.author: zachary hines

customer_reviews.title: Movie screen
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I wasn’t happy with it. I was so exited to receive my order, but ... we open as soon as we got it and try to set up. But no matter what it would not stand and inflate . Very disappointed had to send it back :(
customer_reviews.author: Hello there

customer_reviews.title: A great outdoor screen if used right
customer_reviews.text: Patience is the key for this screen, a few recommendations let it blow up for a little while before using to pull wrinkles out of the screen. ANCHOR the screen....I can't stress this enough. Even on a slight breezy day the wind will make it move. The screen doesn't way much. When your done with the screen let ALL the air come out of the screen before trying to pack it. If you don't it will be impossible to pack away. Overall it's a great screen for movie nights and a new fun thing to do with my kids
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I anticipated 😏
customer_reviews.text: So the setup seemed fine upon opening the box. I encountered my first mishap after realizing I had the “screen” upside down, and I noticed one of the buckles from to the screen from the frame was missing. I ended pulling one of from the bottom to reattach to the top. Then the top of the frame kept buckling down. We adjusted the straps in case they were too tight, pulled the stakes and tried to level the entire setup several times, but we still had a “dented screen.” Likely sending it back because it kills the entire movie experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good screen!
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable screen is great! Stays inflated very well, and is very sturdy, even in windy situations. It comes with plenty of ropes to anchor, and we're very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: laidbackguy29

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: We were very surprised by the size of the screen and how easy was to put together. The fans are on the bottom and just plug in and that's it. Takes a little bit of work to complete put back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Vieira

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge!!!!! Seems pretty well made though. We used it for the first time last night and the set up was somewhat easy. I think I had more difficulty trying to get all the air out and back in the the bag than I did setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Huge and fast movie night anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Huge screen, great for a backyard movie, we use it at the end station for gaming also. We also use it for church family movie nights. Fan is a little loud but nothing for my sound bar and sub. Little tip, when your putting it up, roll the top, unzip around the fans and ease the air out from the mid. Then you can zip it back up and roll the fans to the mid. Makes take down pretty easy. About 10 mins to inflate and anchor, 15 to take down and put up. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Pyro

customer_reviews.title: VERY EASY TO SET UP AND TAKE DOWN
customer_reviews.text: WORTH EVERY PENNY SPENT!!! VERY EASY TO SET UP AND TAKE DOWN, KIDS LOVE HAVING MOVIE NIGHT OUTSIDE. VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun and a great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased during a lightning deal in Dec. 2018. During quarantine decided to try it. Easy to inflate and anchor. My only complaint is as others have said, the wrinkled screen another complaint is as we were setting it up I noticed a seam is starting to unravel and we had never even used it before. Overall, everyone enjoyed the screen. We set it up.in our front yard and everyone walking/driving by loved it. We set it up with a projector and connected out FireStick to it. Will be using again as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for backyard movie theatre
customer_reviews.text: Used in huge backyard. Great visability. Everyone enjoyed. Had to buy a new case to store it since one that came with it too small once I had unpacked & used screen
customer_reviews.author: C Panai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and maintain
customer_reviews.text: This screen rocks! Easy to setup and maintain. This is screen number 2 to my inventory. Huge hit for families with younger kids, smaller audiences and very budget friendly to rent out. May consider a third screen this spring and have three rental screens available for this summer. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: BULLET BLAIS

customer_reviews.title: Social Distance Summer Amen!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and just what we needed for a social distance summer. Screen is HUGE but easy to inflate. Don’t need the stakes or tethers if it’s not an overly breezy night. The darker it gets the more vibrant the colors. My only complaint is zero chance of deflating and getting it back into the little bag that it comes in. We just grabbed an oversized storage tub and call it a day. Otherwise a great purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I used it once and easy plug and inflate. Im not sure if I did something wrong but the clips on white mat/screen dont match up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Great at 150.00 on sale
customer_reviews.text: Been using every weekend. This screen is great easy to set up. Get a large tub to put it in to store. Pull it out of tub and set up in 5 mins or less.
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor movie night
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Inflates and assembles very easily. The screen is the perfect size for our outdoor movie nights. Don't even hear the fans blowing. Very sturdy. The only knock I have is I can't fit it back into the duffel bag provided. Ended up buying a 90 quart plastic tub that I put this and all my outdoor movie gear into. Regardless, I would still purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: IndyMustang

customer_reviews.title: ... of reviews I had read but I am so happy I decided to order it I figured I could ...
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly was skeptical and almost hesitant buying this because of reviews I had read but I am so happy I decided to order it I figured I could send back if anything but we love it now I hope it holds up for at least our twins birthday party turning our backyard into a out door theater also the caring tote is amazing and the screen fit perfectly definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't really love it.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I thought that it would have the bottom weighted or at least sized enough so it wouldn't tip over....it's ok, don't really love it....could have just hung a large white sheet to have the show....live and learn....
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic stakes were easy to bend and a few broke but overall, My kids LOVE it! I’m VERY pleased with my purchase😊 WOW, they sent me NEW STAKES😍❣️ I would recommend this seller to EVERYONE, my package was delivered on time! My OVERALL EXPERIENCE was SPECTACULAR!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Than Happy
customer_reviews.text: Wow Talk About Meeting My Expectations... This Was Father's Day 2020 In My Yard. The Fans Were Not Noticeable. Bigger Than What I Imagined. I Will Say This Is Perfect For Movie/Game Night In The Yard. I Will Be Purchasing A Bigger One For My Outdoor DJ Events.....
customer_reviews.author: alberto martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product is as described and is exactly what we expected. Even more praiseworthy is the way the company stands by their product. When I blew it up, we noticed a small pin head size hole. I ordered a replacement. They issued a return label immediately and sent the new one the very next day and said I had 30 days to return the original. That is customer service at its best. The new one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ramzi

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: Used it camping easy to put up and take down, it was a hit! Then came home and used it in backyard. Again awesome. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Did not inflat well product is poorly made and did not last. I would not recommend buying. Sheet with to ladders work better.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Buckenham

customer_reviews.title: Who needs the theaters????!
customer_reviews.text: I really missed going OUT, to the movies, and this Gemmy 39127-32 deluxe airflow movie screen PLUS the Z606 5.1 speakers really did a great job bringing the big screen theater experience to my own backyard!! Thank you!!! I needed that!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jrdahman

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect and I like that the back of the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and I like that the back of the screen is black so no one could see from across the street that you are having a movie night. And the size of the screen it's 144 inches if someone wants to know, also it is not flimsy at all, it's pretty sturdy. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge . Very nice tho. Only thing is that it must stay plugged in to stay inflated. Other than that it's easy to setup up. Make sure you have a plan on setup it needs to be tied down and staked in or it won't stand straight.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing - much larger, affordable, better quality and user friendly than ones we have owned in the past!
customer_reviews.text: This iss amazing - much larger, affordable, better quality and user-friendly​ than ones we have owned in the past! I love having the thick base of the screen so that it is elevated and easier for the kids at the back to see. I have this one flagged and will be buying an additional one as soon as we get an additional projector!
customer_reviews.author: Jumper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect we've used it several times already, easy up easy down best Idea was from another gentlemen that gave his review in which was it's much easier to buy a storage bin, I purchased a storage bin at Hone Depot with wheels and makes it perfect to keep everything all in one... Projector, stand, cables, and screen. The screen may be a little wrinkle haven't figured out how to rid the wrinkles but you can't even see them when watching a movie but I do roll my screen now instead of folding it...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fans on the bottom shorted out
customer_reviews.text: We really loved using this product. We used it about five times over the course of the year we had it. But on this last time we went to use it one of the fans stopped working. This does not allow the screen to blow up all the way. Kind of disappointed considering we haven’t even had it a full year yet. Hoping the manufacturer reach out and do something.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not for me.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. However I live in a windy area and keeping it up takes a lot more work than I'd prefer. I have a fairly large yard for a california home and what I discovered is that it sits very high, so you need a lot of yard space so you can be far back enough to see. Not a bad product, just doesn't work for what I need. Breakdown is not as simple as it seems. Took over 20 minutes and stuffing it in the back is cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie85

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great picture hard to put back in the storage bag though
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! We used this for the first time during movie night with friends and family. The picture is surprisingly clear and it inflates and deflates very quickly. The only drawback is folding it so that it fits neatly into the bag - that's a big struggle. I would recommend it to anyone considering an outdoor screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Too much fan noise!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that the fan always has to be on in order for this to work. That means your movie volume is always competing with the hum of a fan. Also it's a bit clunky to set up. Not a fan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to play scary movies in our front yard for Halloween. It was the best Halloween ever. The product looked awesome and was for the most part easy to set up. You do need two people to put it in the bag when putting it away. Also if you don't want any wrinkles in the screen you do need to take it out a couple of days before use and not just a couple of hours. In all great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Candace V

customer_reviews.title: Waited too long to return..Shortage in motor
customer_reviews.text: Inflatable on the right had a shortage so it will not stay up..i wish i would have known this earlier..i tried to used it when i first got it but it did the same thing..i thought my husband didn't want to put it up but when i got someone to do it..they said the motor for the right side has a shortage in it..long story short...its past the window time to exchange
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Bought for friend as a gift st Christmas. Was on sale for $99. They love it for pool side party and camping. Wish I bought myself one when it was on sale!
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: Worst screen
customer_reviews.text: This was such a cheap product! It was flimsy and it came with broken clips and dirty screen.
customer_reviews.author: Juicycelebrity

customer_reviews.title: It's really awesome. Wish I could give them a 4
customer_reviews.text: It's really awesome. Wish I could give them a 4.5 instead of 4 but the reason for not perfect 5 star is because you can only shoot the movie from the front and not from the back. I used it for my apartment pool movie night event, and this movie screen was the easiest part about it!
customer_reviews.author: Event Queen

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck ever - Amazing Screen for any event.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've ever bought for the money. Don't use it a lot but for big events its a show stopper and blows away my guest. Easy to setup and take down. Well thought out and easy to store afterwards. Holds up to some serious wind. Picture is good and gets better if you roll up, instead of fold your screen and make sure it's tight. I think 90% of the picture is the source i'm using and the projector. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MSE Sales

customer_reviews.title: Great for movie night.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Been lots of fun. 12 ft is large. This is for movie night with family and friends. It is not the best screen, creases and sometimes is hard to get it to stand up straight. But, it is a lot of fun, people are blown away by it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It was acting like there was an air leak
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first time we used it. The 2nd time it would not fully inflate (not taut) so it would not stand up, even with support. It was acting like there was an air leak. We read all of the instructions and checked the zippers. We spent over an hour looking for rips or tears, and could not find any. The return window closed yesterday, so now we are out $166 and have to buy a different screen.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Huge and great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bigger than I thought. Blew it up initially in my living room not thinking that it would reach my high ceiling. All in all we love it. Glad I read the reviews and chose this item. We did buy metal stakes at walmart for $1 each to hold it down and tied it to the fence so it wouldn't blow
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: They love it, they watched a few movies from the ...
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my son's family end of summer. They love it, they watched a few movies from the hot tub at night. Plus they were able to put it up in the basement for a movie night.
customer_reviews.author: gayle tangen

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand alone correctly?
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression this would stand alone as well as could be used in the yard...Even if I stood this in the yard with the stakes it would still buckle. Defect with this particular screen or does this happen to every screen like this? I buckles down from the top
customer_reviews.author: danielle crotty

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The screen doesn’t inflate completely leaving the top center to bend in, which makes it necessary to tie it down with some sort of Jimmy rig. Good luck. I’d love to hear from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to Covid summer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest freaking thing for your backyard covid summer. Inflated super fast. Great size. Beats going to the drive in.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyMama

customer_reviews.title: Big screen!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge screen to watch movies on. Screen reflects projector well. I use a view sonic PJD 5134 with it and am extremely happy with the combo. Running a LG NB3530A sound bar that is not very impressive. I really believe i have TV's with louder speakers than this sound bar(not recommended). But is a awesome set up the kids in the whole neighborhood enjoy it. Do watch out if u live in a windy area this thing is a huge sail. Tie down stakes that come with it are not that good but replacement stakes can be found just about anywhere that sells tents for a couple bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage, took the item out of the box for first time and it doesn’t fully inflate to even hold the screen up. No wind whatsoever to blow it over the built in blower isn’t strong enough to hold it up. Outdoor movie night canceled, kids have been looking forward to it for a few weeks since it arrived, huge letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Joni I Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product might have to get a bigger one from Gemmy once I get the okay from my wife 😎
customer_reviews.text: We have used it 5 times outdoor already we are using a 4K 3D projector with one of my Bose LT1 Model 2 with double Base bottoms the picture on this screen is amazing and the sound well you would have to hear it to believe it
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wild

customer_reviews.title: Unusable, inflation fans underpowered.  Buy something better.
customer_reviews.text: The included inflation fans are not up to the job, there's no way that this thing would stand on its own. We had to tie it the house and garage to hold it up, definitely not worth the trouble. This thing is going straight into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy K.

customer_reviews.title: Missing a buckle and hole in the stitching of the screen
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving it three stars is because it was missing one of the buckles to hold down the screen and there was a hole in the side of the movie screen where the stitching did not catch. Otherwise this product was kind of sufficient and serve the purpose. But I would like the company to send me another Buckle or a replacement screen
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Do be careful, take your time. Product is sturdy, however, I wouldn't leave it out in the elements overnight if you want to make it last a long time. Can be setup by yourself, however, a friend makes it much easier. Fan is not noisy at all. Purchase a storage box twice the size you think you are going to need. Trying to get it back into the provided storage / transport bag is near impossible, and you will end up damaging the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Doppler79

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for movie night with the Kids and Grandkids, still playing with the projector, but nice size and easy viewing for all!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Sags in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Its missing two buckles and the middle sags from the weight of the screen. I ordered it for Christmas so I'm glad that I opened it first. I'm returning it! I purchased the slightly bigger one. I'm hoping it is better than this one and comes with all the parts! The buckles wouldnt be a deal breaker but the sagging is!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This was super easy to set up and worked awesome for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to set up and worked awesome for my daughter and her friends to watch movies outside! great size and comes with a nice storage bag that everything EASILY fits in when putting it away. Great product for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: kayla peterson

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor movie screen.
customer_reviews.text: It was more difficult to put up the metal screw pins were not heavy enough and two broke when putting them in the ground. The plastic tent stakes were equally not heavy enough; they bent when hammering them in the ground. I used a rubber mallet. I plan to replace all of your stakes with heavier ones from lowes. Over all I wish I had purchased something free standing and sturdier, however we will make due. On the bright side the grandchildren loved it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJune Spadaccino

customer_reviews.title: Great summer purchase for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: We got this yesterday and have already used it. What a great summer outdoor family product! fans need to stay running but they are quite (so far) so it doesn't interfere with movie sounds. Folds up nice in its own bag. So far, we're really glad we go it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick and simple.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an event for disabled children to have a movie night. It was amazing. Perfect size, super easy to assemble and the the fans are quiet! The power cord isn't long so make sure you have an extension cord. It comes with its own bag to store which isn't very big but fits the screen fine. But either than that, this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjunkii

customer_reviews.title: Blower Broke after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited about this outdoor movie screen and enjoyed it for 3-4 uses at neighborhood movie nights. About 6 weeks after purchasing, one of the blowers broke and now the screen will no longer blow up. We are past the exchange/return window. I am not sure how to go about contacting the seller about fixing it or replacing the broken blower.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and easy to take down. This is perfect for my teenagers to have friends over outside during Covid to watch a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great, Great, Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, can I say "Huge!!!" and "small"price. Really easy set up and the take down and storage was simple. Going to use this weekend I will post picture of use with movies.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baca

customer_reviews.title: : -( I was so excited... ...
customer_reviews.text: :-( I was so excited...1st time using it. I had it all set up for UFC 200... It was ready to go... As I was focusing the projector the far side fan stop working... Game over. Not sure what to do next. I was sure I was giving this a 5 star rating before tonight. dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations by far!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a Thursday afternoon and selected next day shipping and I got it within 18 hours!!! We went camping and I set it up all 3 nights and it worked perfect. The quality is good for the price. The fans were not very loud and didn't bother anyone. Great job with the bag it comes with. Most things NEVER go back in the bag after opening and this did very easily . If your on the fence about buying it just do it. It's worth it and the kids will love it.
customer_reviews.author: SUPERHONKEY

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and take down. Quality really good especially for price. Have watched Football and movies in backyard and it's been great. I ended up buying because renting was so expensive. Really glad we did because I know we will use it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great item. works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the money... the tethers really help it stabilize when used outdoors. The screen itself can be rolled for storage and this helps with the wrinkles.. but once the movie is playing on it the wrinkles are not an issue..Great item we have used it several times and love it!
customer_reviews.author: John M Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Easy in this case = Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Sold as a new item, was dirty and screen had been torn. Worst part Amazon could offer no replacement only a refund. Also having tried it out inside it doesn’t even stay inflated. I would steer clear of this product
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Leigh

product_meta.title: Gemmy 39127-32 - Airblown - Movie Screen - 120"x70" Widescreen Deluxe w/Storage Bag - Blue
product_meta.description:
Style:Outdoor Inflatable Deluxe Movie ScreenERROR:#N/A

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Create and transport your own movie theater with the Gemmy 12 ft. Inflatable Diagonal Widescreen Airblown Deluxe Movie Screen. The screen self-inflates in minutes to create a full-size, widescreen movie screen that shows your favorite movies, TV shows, video presentations and more. Tethers, yard stakes, a fan and a bag are included for easy setup and storage. Motor for self inflation is included
feature_bullets: 123" X 70" Movie screen, 12' High by 11.5' Wide
144" Screen measure diagonally, 16: 9 aspect ratio, raised screen for better viewing
Stakes, tethers, and storage bag included
Self inflates in seconds, Includes 2 Built in fans

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,323 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
